DataModel

Class Transaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataModel.Transaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObserverPattern.IObserver, ObserverPattern.ISubject

    public class Transaction
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObserverPattern.ISubject, ObserverPattern.IObserver
    This class represents a Transaction.

      • Transaction

        public Transaction(int transactionNo,
           int advert_id,
           int payee,
           int payer,
           int paid,
           java.sql.Date completed)
        Default constructor assigning values to the variables.
        Parameters:
        transactionNo - - int value being the unique transaction number.
        advert_id - - int value being the advert id associated with the transaction.
        payee - - int value being the identifier of the Member.
        payer - - int value being the identifier of the Member.
        paid - - int value being the units paid.
        completed - - Date value being the date the transaction was completed on.
